pages.text: The lifeblood of end-game progression, this resource is rare, powerful, and expensive. Due to its classification as a metalloid as well as its amorphous and unnatural properties, mystite has an invaluable use in armor, weapons, tools, semiconductor technology, and "mystcraft"

Endemic to the deep recesses and surroundings caverns of The Rifted Zone, mystite ore cannot be readily smelted into a pure form and instead requires a multi-step refining process in order to separate itself from other minerals and remove impurities.
